channel.title: Messed up commands.java
channel.description: im working on my new server (PI source), and my commands java is really messed up it says that there are 5 errors, but i have tried looking for them, i couldnt find them. could someone give me a fixed commands.java please? [PI source] ty in advance =]

item.title: Messed up commands.java
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:11, topic:387775”]No, the error is coming from the player class but the actually variable was declared in the client class.

Urgh, I can’t think properly today, but I’m most sure it is.

/stressed.[/quote]
I don’t think so, IIRC, the client class extends the player class, so all the fields and methods can also be used via the client class. Also the compiler says; “class server.model.players.Player”.

Once again, IIRC, all the updatePlayer* calls are in the Player class.

I could be wrong though.

Read full topic

item.title: Messed up commands.java
item.dc:creator: @Mod_L Mod L
item.description:
@Mod_L wrote:

so basicly the error is coming from client.java? and i have to add this to it? public int isDonator; public int monkeyk0ed; im a little confused today. thanks alot for bringing up fome anwsers

Read full topic

item.title: Messed up commands.java
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

No, the error is coming from the player class but the actually variable was declared in the client class.

Urgh, I can’t think properly today, but I’m most sure it is.

/stressed.

Read full topic

item.title: Messed up commands.java
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Saphire`:

then find appearanceUpdateRequired variable in client.java and change it from private to public so other classes have access to it.

I think this one is in the Player class.

Read full topic

item.title: Messed up commands.java
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Declare the following in client.java

public int isDonator; public int monkeyk0ed;

then find appearanceUpdateRequired variable in client.java and change it from private to public so other classes have access to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Messed up commands.java

item.description:
@Mod_L wrote:

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commandsss.java:16: class Commands is public, s
hould be declared in a file named Commands.java

^

symbol : variable isDonator
location: class server.model.players.Client

1){
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commandsss.java:166: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable monkeyk0ed
location: class server.model.players.Client
c2.monkeyk0ed = 0;
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commandsss.java:503: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable isDonator
location: class server.model.players.Player
Server.playerHan
dler.players[i].isDonator = 1;

           ^

src\server\model\players\packets\Commandsss.java:517: appearanceUpdateRequired h
as private access in server.model.players.Player
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commandsss.java:523: appearanceUpdateRequired h
as private access in server.model.players.Player
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
^
